>>44316094
> [[ UI Messenger – Crimson Guardian Liza ]]
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: Hey, are you there? I need some tips about Celestial Artifacts.
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: I might be creating one soon.
> [[ Crimson Guardian Liza ]]: Oh?
> [[ Crimson Guardian Liza ]]: Well, then.
> [[ Crimson Guardian Liza ]]: I suppose I can share what I know.
> [[ Crimson Guardian Liza ]]: There's just a few small things, basically.
> [[ Crimson Guardian Liza ]]: Be brief. The Celestials hate lawyers.
> [[ Crimson Guardian Liza ]]: Be formal. Pretend you're actually talking to gods, even if you feel like an idiot doing it.
> [[ Crimson Guardian Liza ]]: Don't be afraid to back out and start over.
> [[ Crimson Guardian Liza ]]: And remember that, to our knowledge, nothing is impossible.
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: You figured all that out?
> [[ Crimson Guardian Liza ]]: No, actually, I already knew what I wanted when I went in.

How special.

Your UI pings—Ayla's sent out a message to everyone.

> [[ The communication equipment is ready. ]]

“Alright,” you say, kneeling. “I'd like a belt that would grant me strength and endurance far beyond normal.”

There's a distant rumbling, and the color of the room changes as marble eyes light up.

> [[ Yes; for this Artifact is truly fitting of a martial hero. ]]
> [[ In the time before time, mere men lifted mountains in our name. ]]
> [[ Is this the power you desire? ]]
> [[ Return to us merely four of our gifts, and we will grant what you seek. ]]

> Continue speaking. (Write-in.)
> Head up to the communication hub.
name: Sylvetica
